last_episode_to_air.name: Platypi on Film
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Platypus Brothers critique their favorite movies (all of them Taz-themed parodies of famous films).

name: Taz-Mania
overview:
Taz-Mania is an American cartoon sitcom produced by Warner Bros. Animation from 1991 to 1995, broadcast in the United States on Fox and in Canada on Baton Broadcast System. The show follows the adventures of the classic Looney Tunes character, Taz in the fictional land of Tazmania.

Similar to other Warner Brothers cartoons of its time, such as Animaniacs and Tiny Toon Adventures, Taz-Mania frequently broke the fourth wall, and often made jokes showing that Taz could actually speak perfectly normal when he wanted to. The intro indicates that, in this rendering of Tasmania, "the sky's always yellow, rain or shine". The title song is performed by Jess Harnell and Jim Cummings.

episodes.name: The Dog the Turtle Story
episodes.overview: Taz rescues a turtle which acts like a dog from a trap and adopts him as a pet, but then he and him visit his outback family and they all rescue Taz from Bull Gator and Axl.

episodes.name: Like Father, Like Son
episodes.overview: Taz and his dad (hugh) spend some 'quality' time together. After a series of disastrous activities they discover that maybe they are more alike then they think.

episodes.name: Frights of Passage
episodes.overview: Francis X. Bushlad seeks to capture the Tazmanian Devil as part of his rite to manhood.

episodes.name: War & Pieces
episodes.overview: Taz and his little siblings Molly and Jake are left to run the house while their parents visit Grandma.

episodes.name: Airbourne Airhead
episodes.overview: With help from the Platypus Brothers Daniel and Timothy, Taz attempts to climb Pointy Peak and obtain giant bird eggs with which to make a Taz-sized omelet.

episodes.name: It's No Picnic
episodes.overview: Taz goes to visit the platypus brothers and spots some giant eggs on top of a mountain. Unfortunately the platypus brothers decide to help.

episodes.name: Kee-Wee ala King
episodes.overview: Taz and his best friend, Buddy Boar, compete.

episodes.name: A Devil of a Job
episodes.overview: To earn money to buy a motorcycle, Taz gets a job at Hotel Tazmania.

episodes.name: Battling Bushrats
episodes.overview: Taz defends his home, and the family's dinner, from repeated attacks by the Battling Bushrats.

episodes.name: Devil in the Deep Blue Sea
episodes.overview: Didgeri Dingo enlists Taz's aid to retrieve undersea treasure, but taz does all the work.

episodes.name: Woeful wolf
episodes.overview: The last lonely Tazmanian Wolf tries to find a family to live with.

episodes.name: Devil with the Violet Dress On
episodes.overview: Taz and his mom spend the day doing fun things together, with disastrous results.

episodes.name: Kidnapped Koala
episodes.overview: After Constance is abducted by Bull.

episodes.name: Mishap in the Mist
episodes.overview: Anthropologist Jane Allgood decides to study the Tazmanian Devil family.

episodes.name: Toothache Taz
episodes.overview: Taz refuses to see a dentist while suffering a toothache and turns to the Platypus Brothers for help.

episodes.name: Here, Kitty, Kitty, Kitty
episodes.overview: Molly gets a cute cat for a pet, who quickly becomes Taz's worst nightmare.

episodes.name: Enter the Devil
episodes.overview: Mr. Thickley trains Taz to be a kung-fu master.

episodes.name: Bewitched bob
episodes.overview: While babysitting Jake, Taz is unexpectedly called to work and must bring Jake with him.

episodes.name: Instant replay
episodes.overview: Bull and Axl Gator study videotapes, hoping to learn from their past failures how to capture Taz.

episodes.name: Taz and the Pterodactyl
episodes.overview: Taz plunges into uncharted Tazmanian territory.

episodes.name: Pup Goes the Wendal
episodes.overview: Wendal Wolf kicks Dog the Turtle out of Taz's house and inserts himself as the new family pet.

episodes.name: I'm OK, You're Taz
episodes.overview: Buddy Boar tries to improve Taz's personality.

episodes.name: Comic Madness
episodes.overview: The family is worried that Taz is spending too much time with his comic books.

episodes.name: Blunders Never Cease
episodes.overview: Francis resorts to taking tribal potions in his quest to capture Taz.

episodes.name: Amazing Shrinking Taz and Co
episodes.overview: The Platypus Brothers shrink Taz so Bull and Axl can capture him, but Bull and Axl are also inadvertently reduced in size.

episodes.name: Oh, Brother
episodes.overview: While playing ball, a gorilla that Jake accidentally hit on the head annoys Taz and Jake.

episodes.name: Taz-Babies
episodes.overview: The VP of Bandicoot Broadcasting suggests changes for an episode of Taz-Mania.

episodes.name: Jake's Big Date
episodes.overview: Taz is asked to babysit Heather, the little Tazmanian Devil he's in love with.

episodes.name: Taz Live
episodes.overview: The comedian Bushwhacker Bob hired fails to show.

episodes.name: A Midsummer Night's Scream
episodes.overview: Taz and Bob spend a horror-filled night at a very strange motel.

episodes.name: Astro Taz
episodes.overview: Taz climbs into a cockpit of a space shuttle just as it blasts off.

episodes.name: Tazmanian Lullaby
episodes.overview: Francis discovers Taz's love of accordion music and uses it to capture him.

episodes.name: Deer Taz
episodes.overview: Taz must compete with other predators over an adorable baby deer that he can't bring himself to eat.

episodes.name: A Taz-Manian Moment
episodes.overview: In an "unused" scene from Ticket Taker Taz, Molly uses her paddleball to scam Taz out of the concert tickets.

episodes.name: The Outer Taz-Manian Zone
episodes.overview: Molly's wish to have Taz experience what it's like to be her has unexpected consequences for Molly.

episodes.name: Here, Kitty, Kitty, Kitty, Part 2
episodes.overview: Molly's adorable little kitty returns to torture and torment Taz.

episodes.name: Taz-Mania's Funniest Home Videos
episodes.overview: Taz decides to submit a tape of his family to Funniest Home Videos.

episodes.name: Bottle Cap Blues
episodes.overview: Taz and Dingo fight with the elusive Kee Wee over a rare bottle cap for their collection.

episodes.name: Hypnotazed
episodes.overview: Bull Gator accidentally hypnotizes himself into thinking he's a Tasmanian Devil.

episodes.name: Mum's n' Taz's
episodes.overview: Taz and Mum get trapped in an abandoned mine shaft.

episodes.name: Boys Just Wanna Have Fun
episodes.overview: Hugh, Taz, and Jake prove that boys just want to have fun as they revel in a day of pandemonium while Mom and Molly are away.

episodes.name: Unhappy Together
episodes.overview: The Platypus Brothers fight over Taz's attention.

episodes.name: Food for Thought
episodes.overview: Taz desires an egg that is located on a little island surrounded by piranha-infested waters.

episodes.name: Gone to Pieces
episodes.overview: Taz attempts to repair a prized vase of Mom's that he accidentally broke.

episodes.name: Kee-Wee Cornered
episodes.overview: Fed up with Taz eating all her pet birds, Molly goes out and gets a Kee-Wee Bird.

episodes.name: But Is It Taz?
episodes.overview: Taz quits the show out of anger for all the abuse he takes every episode and gets a fast-food job instead.

episodes.name: Mall Wrecked
episodes.overview: When the car breaks down, Taz, Jean, and Molly are left stranded in an empty mall parking lot.

episodes.name: A Dingo's Guide to Magic
episodes.overview: Dingo uses a magic kit to trick the gullible Taz out of a giant gold nugget he's found.

episodes.name: The Man from M.A.R.S.
episodes.overview: After hearing a scary sci-fi program on the radio, Taz attacks a vacationing Marvin the Martian out of fear that he wants to conquer the Earth.

episodes.name: Friends for Strife
episodes.overview: Dingo shares with Taz all the adventures they've shared since they first met.

episodes.name: Wacky Wombat
episodes.overview: Willie Wombat is cast as Taz's foil in a semi-parody of the original Taz cartoons.

episodes.name: Molly's Folly
episodes.overview: Taz gets roped into taking ballet classes with Molly.

episodes.name: A Flea for Me
episodes.overview: While doing chores around the house, an enterprising flea jumps on Taz for a meal.

episodes.name: A Young Taz's Fancy
episodes.overview: Taz falls for a Tasmanian She-Devil, but is unaware that it's really Francis in disguise.

episodes.name: Never Cry Taz
episodes.overview: The Platypus Brothers find the entrance to a new world in their attic during Spring Cleaning.

episodes.name: Bully for Bull
episodes.overview: Bull Gator falls into depression over his constant failures, leaving Axl to try and cheer him up.

episodes.name: Of Bushrats and Hugh
episodes.overview: Hugh and Taz declare war on the Bushrats when they discover the little band stealing Hugh's prized oranges.

episodes.name: Merit Badgered
episodes.overview: Mom and Dad cox a reluctant Taz to watch over Jake, who is camping to earn a Bandicoot Scout badge.

episodes.name: Devil Indemnity
episodes.overview: Taz is at home and stuck in a full-body cast. While he struggles to answer the phone and win a TV contest, Jean fills in for his bellhop job at Hotel Tazmania and struggles with Bushwhacker Bob's abuse.

episodes.name: Willie Wombat's Deja Boo-Boo
episodes.overview: The irrepressible Willy Wombat returns to Taz-Mania to battle with Taz.

episodes.name: To Catch a Taz
episodes.overview: Taz is framed for the consumption of a birthday cake, and Wendal T. Wolf is the police officer determined to catch him.

episodes.name: The Thing that Ate the Outback
episodes.overview: Taz creates a blob monster with his new chemistry set, one that just keeps eating and growing.

episodes.name: Because It's There
episodes.overview: Taz and Dingo attempt to climb a mountain.

episodes.name: Antenna Dilemma
episodes.overview: Taz's favorite TV show is interrupted when the cable fails during a storm.

episodes.name: Autograph Pound
episodes.overview: Constance is smitten with a wrestling champion staying at the hotel, but Taz is simply terrorized.

episodes.name: Taz and the Emu Egg
episodes.overview: Taz hunts a surprisingly-swift unhatched emu egg.

episodes.name: Willy Wombat's Last Stand
episodes.overview: Finally fed up with his typecasting, Willie Wombat takes his case to the network itself.

episodes.name: K-Taz Commercial
episodes.overview: Taz's "unique" singing talents are advertised as part of a CD collection.

episodes.name: Doubting Dingo
episodes.overview: Dingo suspects that Taz is plotting to get rid of him.

episodes.name: Sub Commander Taz
episodes.overview: Taz places a mail-order for a submarine, but the wait for its arrival tests his patience.

episodes.name: Feed a Cold
episodes.overview: Taz is sick with a cold. However, it's the Platypus Brothers who suffer the abuse of his illness.

episodes.name: Sidekick for a Day
episodes.overview: Bull Gator fires Axl and hires Taz as his new sidekick.

episodes.name: No Time for Christmas
episodes.overview: Taz fills a bag with presents and tries to deliver Christmas cheer, but no one has time for Christmas.

episodes.name: Road to Tazmania
episodes.overview: Taz, Hugh, and Uncle Drew become involved with spies, a swank nightclub, and a talent contest while on a trip to the store for orange juice.

episodes.name: Taz-Manian Theatre
episodes.overview: Taz and Wendell T. Wolf are trapped on a tiny, uncharted island in the pacific Ocean.

episodes.name: The Bushrats Must Be Crazy
episodes.overview: Jake's rubber duck falls out of the sky and the Bushrats mistake it for a deity.

episodes.name: Return of the Road to Taz-Mania Strikes Back
episodes.overview: Uncle Drew, Taz,, and Hugh get into trouble at a deluxe golf course with the owners and a mysterious caddy.

episodes.name: Taz Like Dingo
episodes.overview: Dingo finds a magic lamp, but the genie insists that Dingo perform three difficult tasks before he grants the customary three wishes.

episodes.name: The Pied Piper of Taz-Mania
episodes.overview: Bushwhacker Bob calls on the Platypus Brothers to get rid of the Bushrats in the Hotel Tazmania.

episodes.name: The Treasure of the Burnt Sienna
episodes.overview: Bushwhacker Bob finds a treasure map.

episodes.name: Not a Shadow of a Doubt
episodes.overview: Taz's shadow comes to life one day and challenges Taz to a basketball game.

episodes.name: Nursemaid Taz
episodes.overview: Dingo pretends to have a broken leg in order to get Taz to take him home.

episodes.name: Home Despair
episodes.overview: Platypus Brothers arrive to teach Taz the art of house repair.

episodes.name: Take All of Me
episodes.overview: Wendel thinks that the zoo might be the perfect preserve for him.

episodes.name: Bird-Brained Beast
episodes.overview: The Platypus Brothers offer Taz their expertise to help capture the elusive and speedy Kee Wee.

episodes.name: Ready, Willing, Unable
episodes.overview: Mr. Thickly becomes ensnared in a trap set for Taz while communing with nature.

episodes.name: We'll Always Have Taz-Mania
episodes.overview: Hugh regales the family with an imaginative mystery story.

episodes.name: Moments You've Missed
episodes.overview: Bull, Axl, and Taz present a compilation of clips that were supposedly cut from previous episodes.

episodes.name: Sidekicked
episodes.overview: Bull leaves to participate in a hula hoop contest.

episodes.name: Gone with the Windbag
episodes.overview: Bushwhacker Bob mistakes Foghorn Leghorn for a travel magazine reviewer and gives him the red-carpet treatment.

episodes.name: Driving Mr. Taz
episodes.overview: Mom teaches Taz to drive, Taz treats Mom to a hair-raising car chase on the freeway.

episodes.name: Mean Bear
episodes.overview: The rats use food to lure Taz into being their protector.

episodes.name: Ticket Taker Taz
episodes.overview: Taz and Molly win a pair of concert tickets in a radio call-in contest.

episodes.name: Taz2
episodes.overview: The platypus Brothers make five clones of Taz to man their new production line.

episodes.name: Mutton for Nothing
episodes.overview: Taz arrives at the sheep meadow to fill in for Ralph Wolf, where Sam Sheepdog performs his usual predator-pounding job on him.

episodes.name: Dr. Wendal and Mr. Taz
episodes.overview: Wendal Wolf mistakes a gamma-radiation chamber for a tanning booth, causing him to transform into a violent monster whenever Taz gets him upset.

episodes.name: Taz-Mania Confidential
episodes.overview: A film crew has arrived to expose every humiliating detail of the Tasmanian Devil family, even those that they make up.

episodes.name: The Platypi Psonic Psensation Psimulator
episodes.overview: The Platypus Brothers use their new invention to probe Taz's memories for "unused" episode segments.

episodes.name: The Not-So-Gladiators
episodes.overview: Taz and Mom are thrilled to be contestants on their favorite game.

episodes.name: One Ring Taz
episodes.overview: Taz wants to join the circus, so Mr. Thickley "helps" him find an act.

episodes.name: Retakes Not Included
episodes.overview: Buddy Boar directs a magnificent chase scene featuring Bull and Axl pursuing Taz.

episodes.name: Pledge Dredge
episodes.overview: Mr. Thickley hosts a telethon to raise money for the show.

episodes.name: Bushlad's Lament
episodes.overview: An elderly Francis, still having not achieved his manhood, is forced to pursue an equally-elderly Taz.

episodes.name: Taz-Mania Comedy Institute
episodes.overview: A documentary on 16-ton weights is featured.

episodes.name: Heartbreak Taz
episodes.overview: Problems arise when Constance Koala confides her love for Taz.

episodes.name: Just Be 'Cuz
episodes.overview: Francis X. Bushlad and his smarter cousin, Edgar, attempt to capture Taz.

episodes.name: The Taz Story Primer
episodes.overview: Molly writes a cartoon.

episodes.name: Ask Taz
episodes.overview: Everybody seems to find great wisdom in Taz's frequent line of "Taz hate water", so Bushwhacker Bob exploits it as a way to make money.

episodes.name: It's a Taz's Life
episodes.overview: Taz squirms with embarrassment when cast members of Taz-Mania recall memorable moments of his life.

episodes.name: Gee Bull!
episodes.overview: Bull Gator resorts to extreme teaching methods in order to knock some sense into Axl.

episodes.name: Taz in Keeweeland
episodes.overview: Taz finds himself sucked into a fanciful place populated by millions of Kee Wees.

episodes.name: Stuck for Bucks
episodes.overview: The need for immediate funds brings Taz into battle with his seemingly-indestructible piggy bank.

episodes.name: A Philosophical Taz Moment
episodes.overview: Taz contemplates nature and his enslavement for food.

episodes.name: The Origin of the Beginning of the Incredible Taz-Man
episodes.overview: Taz takes advice from Mr. Thickley on how to become a real-life superhero.

episodes.name: Francis Takes a Stand
episodes.overview: Taz and Francis set up competing lemonade stands in hopes of making big money.

episodes.name: Yet Another Road to Taz-Mania
episodes.overview: Once more, Taz is stuck on a road trip with Hugh and Uncle Drew. This time, they're going bowling, and the spies are after their new bowling ball.

episodes.name: Bad Luck Bottlecap
episodes.overview: Dingo tries to get rid of a cursed bottlecap by passing it on to Taz, but his attempts continue to backfire.

episodes.name: A Story with a Moral
episodes.overview: An injured Taz is being nursed back to health by an overbearing (and clumsy) Scotsman.

episodes.name: One Saturday in Taz-Mania
episodes.overview: Taz's lazy Saturday is continuously interrupted by Jake.

episodes.name: Platypi on Film
episodes.overview: The Platypus Brothers critique their favorite movies (all of them Taz-themed parodies of famous films).
